name: SortingSock
0:
”Alexa, ask SortingSock what house is Diana in.”
”Alexa, ask SortingSock to tell me about Thomas.”
”Alexa, ask SortingSock about Joseph”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sorting sock
des: Ask SortingSock what house you belong in, and it will sort you into a Harry Potter house!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
